quotes.quote: I have seen many successful people fail after they start fearing they might lose what they have built.
Successful people understand the value of time. Once they commit to doing something, they would never cancel.
A great sense of commitment builds a hardworking spirit.
The more you dream, the farther you get.
I've found that most successful people do things because they get personal satisfaction from the work that they do.
The most successful people I know are also the most reliable.
It's often the case that successful people invite criticism.
Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day-in and day-out.
If there is no struggle, there is no progress.
It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
Opportunity doesn't make appointments, you have to be ready when it arrives.
Successful people are always looking for opportunities to help others. Unsuccessful people are always asking, What's in it for me?
It's a funny thing about life, once you begin to take note of the things you are grateful for, you begin to lose sight of the things that you lack.
If you don't build your dream, someone else will hire you to help them build theirs.
Never allow your reality to be influenced by another's listless view of you.
Though no one can backtrack and create a brand new start, Everyone is capable of taking their life in a brand new direction.
Everybody loves success, but they hate successful people.
Successful people are simply those with successful habits.
Success is about creating benefit for all and enjoying the process. If you focus on this & adopt this definition, success is yours.
Most of the successful people I've known are the ones who do more listening than talking.

People who succeed have momentum. The more they succeed, the more they want to succeed, and the more they find a way to succeed. Similarly, when someone is failing, the tendency is to get on a downward spiral that can even become a self-fulfilling prophecy.
Willpower is the key to success. Successful people strive no matter what they feel by applying their will to overcome apathy, doubt or fear.
To be successful, you must accept all challenges that come your way. You can't just accept the ones you like.
Successful people are not interesting. I feel for the losers. That's where my heart lies.
As we look ahead into the next century, leaders will be those who empower others.
Successful people breed success.
Our greatest fear should not be of failure but of succeeding at things in life that don't really matter.
Even if everybody says it's impossible, with determination, there is always something you can do. The last thing is to give up without trying.
Successful people ask better questions, and as a result, they get better answers.
Don't limit yourself. Many people limit themselves to what they think they can do. You can go as far as your mind lets you. What you believe, remember, you can achieve.
